short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a space dedicated to triaging

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Triager Hub is a Chrome Web Store extension designed for users of the Blender Projects website at https://projects.blender.org/[username].

It enhances your experience on the site by creating a new interface to efficiently organize user triage information.

The extension displays the number of reports opened and triaged.

To triage, users can perform actions such as closing reports, confirming them, or marking them as "Needs Information from User" or "Needs Info from Developers."
